name: jQuery-autogrow-textarea
tagline: A jQuery plugin to make textarea be resized automatically to fit its contents.
body:
### Pros
* Capable with multibyte characters.
* Simple to use.

### A bit more precise description
Typical plugins that provides similar features with this plugin usually hooks keypress event to observe textarea input.
However, under multibyte IME environment,
`keypress`, `keydown`, `keyup` events are never invoked until trans literation choices to be fixed.
So that I, as a Japanese, decided to write another implementation to do the job.
